name: Michele Alboreto
introduction: Michele Alboreto (mi-KAY-lay AL-bore-ET-oh; born December 23rd 1956 in Milan, Italy  died April 25th 2001 in Klettwitz, Brandenburg, Germany) was an Italian Formula One driver from the 80s and 90s. Alboreto was killed during a test session with an Audi sports car at the Lausitzring in Germany.
